node.prompt: Welcome to your exciting future in the criminal rehabilitation program!
As you're obviously aware, you're the filthy criminal!
Not to worry though, I am your F.R.I.E.N.D!
As your F.R.I.E.N.D I am both responsible for you, and responsible for deeming when you will be fit to return to society!
Now criminal, your exciting life as a galaxy rim asteroid miner can begin!
Your job is to mine flux crystals and other useful minerals for the grand empire.
Also it is suggested that you aim to gather some ice while you're out an about. That is if you value the ability to breathe.
You'll notice of course that your oxygen supply is limited, so don't fly too far from the station! Go get 'em kid!
